name: Skating Dude Justin HD - Free Pocket Edition Game
name_original: Skating Dude Justin HD - Free Pocket Edition Game
description:
* BE CAREFUL: ONLY FOR PRO GAMERS *

Are you ready for the ultimate challenge?
The new Skating Game is now on your iPhone, iPod and iPad!

Tap on your device to make him jump. Avoid obstacles to level up. Win fantastic trophies to pimp him up... But most importantly... Smash your friends high score.
